body.p:
Danville Ky
Nov 10 1860
His Excellency
Gov Magoffin.

I enclose a petition from W H Hughes asking for a remission of fine &c -- & am satisfied they ought to be remitted -- Hughes is a young man visiting with his mother, & not in the habit of carrying weapons as I understand -- I trust you will find it propoer to do so. -- At all events there ought to be a respite for twelve months.
